snippet: The Irish drug company Elan, which wants to remake itself, is selling its interest in its highly successful multiple sclerosis drug Tysabri to its American partner, Biogen Idec.
abstract: Irish drug company Elan, which wants to remake itself, is selling its interest in its highly successful multiple sclerosis drug Tysabri for more than $3.25 billion to its American partner, Biogen Idec.
lead_paragraph: The Irish drug company Elan, which wants to remake itself, is selling its interest in its highly successful multiple sclerosis drug Tysabri to its American partner, Biogen Idec.

headline.seo: Tysabri Drug Sold by Irish Maker to Biogen Idec
headline.main: Irish Maker Sells Its Big MS Drug to Biogen
headline.print_headline: Irish Maker Sells Its Big MS Drug to Biogen
